rows.label: qev041406_MSG0001
rows.name: That explosion came from caravan of Pissa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0002
rows.name:
Pissa was very thorough when teaching Potepote how
to make fireworks, but stupid idiot probably just...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Hello? Yes, Pissa here. Is this Potepote?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0004
rows.name:
Fireworks went BOOM! But Potepote did exactly as
Pissa said, so this all fault of Pissa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0005
rows.name:
Er, Potepote is sure he used exact amount of autiga
powder Pissa said to?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0006
rows.name:
Potepote have better things to do than sit around
measuring all day! Besides, more powder mean bigger
fireworks. Any dummy know that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0007
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0008
rows.name:
Forget all that! Stupid firework blast sent Potepote
flying onto floaty ship near caravan. Pissa need to
get up here and help NOW![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0009
rows.name: Also, Potepote hungry. So bring coldberries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0010
rows.name:
Also also, Potepote only eat berries with spicy sacrifole
pollen on top, so bring that too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0011
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0012
rows.name:
*cough* Hmm? Why so stiff? If Pissa need very thorough
massage, Elder Nan happy toâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0013
rows.name: DON'T TOUCH PISA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0014
rows.name:
Augh! That very last straw! Pissa done with ALL these
idiots! Going to start over with a brand-new life here
in city of human friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_JNK0010
rows.name: Stop

rows.label: qev041406_SEL0011
rows.name: Convince Pissa not to make any rash decisions.

rows.label: qev041406_JNK0020
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: qev041406_SEL0021
rows.name: Encourage Pissa to run and not look back.

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0015
rows.name:
Pissa had it up to HERE with these Nopon! Potepote
and Nan can both rot. Good riddance forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0016
rows.name:
Pissa glad that friend understand. Potepote and Nan
can both rot for all Pissa care. Good riddance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0017
rows.name: Oof! Um...bye, Pissa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0018
rows.name:
Ah well. It was probably inevitable. Still, if friend could
go check on Potepote, it would be huge help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0019
rows.name:
OooOOOH! Such loveliness! Pissa want to try
wearing something that shiny someday.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0020
rows.name:
...Hmm? Potepote? Who is that? Pissa never heard of
big dumb jerk named Potepote.[ST:wait ]
